name: Solar System (itch) (keeansnediker)
description:
This is my solar system. I added every currently recognized planet in our solar system and scaled them appropriately using a 1/1 ratio of earth. For example, Earth's scale is 1,1,1. Jupiter has a diameter of 11.19 Earths, so the scale used for Jupiter is 11.19,11.19,11.19. I did this for every planet, including the Sun but at a 1/4th scale because a full-size replication of the Sun would be too much. I added 53 moons to Jupiter for fun, in honor of the 53 named moons Jupiter currently has. 

Credits

Created by Keean Snediker
